Package ie.gmit.sw

Class ServiceHandler

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.ServiceHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handleator
public class ServiceHandler extends Object implements Handleator
Implementation of Handleator. This is the main handler that connects all other classes together to allow the whole application to be ran from this class alone. The client sees nothing going on in this class as it is abstracted. This class follows the facade pattern.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceHandler

      public ServiceHandler()
      Default Constructor which creates instances of other classes. If the ServiceHandler goes down, so does all the instantiated classes.

    • checkForFullPlagiarism

      public boolean checkForFullPlagiarism()
      Description copied from interface: Handleator
      Checks if the document fully plagiarises any other document in the database. If it does we do not want to store it.
      Specified by:
      checkForFullPlagiarism in interface Handleator
      Returns:
      boolean depending on if there is full plagiarism or not

    • process

      public List<PlagiarismResult> process​(String filePath, HashingMethod hashingMethod) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: Handleator
      Responsible for calling all the other methods. In controller.java, the client can simply call the Process method instead of having to call each method individually. This helps the Handleator follow the facade pattern.
      Specified by:
      process in interface Handleator
      Parameters:
      filePath - - String containing the path to file
      hashingMethod - - Enum which states the hashing method to use

      list of PlagiarismResults
